header.name: Shubham Borade
header.quote: Highly skilled Full Stack Software Engineer with expertise in both frontend and backend development. Capable of handling frontend and backend tasks, including UI design, database integration, and server-side development. Experienced in implementing various payment gateways and customizing search engines for enhanced user experiences. Capable of delivering efficient and user-friendly solutions for diverse projects.

rolesAndResponsibilities: Proficient understanding of both frontend and backend workflows and operations.
Comprehensive grasp of SFCC objects, classes, documentation comprehension, and Checkout flow, among others.
Extensive expertise in MVC structure, AJAX requests, server- side forms rendering, ISML, JSON, Routes, API, Einstein, and related concepts.
Experience includes working with service frameworks and implementing Vimeo, Ordergroove, and other similar solutions.
Managed payment gateways, including Cybersource, and successfully implemented various payment methods like Apple Pay, ZIP, PayPal, and Credit Card.
Developed and repurposed content slots and assets, effectively rendering dynamic content across various pages.
Installed the Klevu (Smart search engine) cartridge and seamlessly integrated it with the storefront.

projectWork: Developed a variety of reusable page designer components that can be utilized across all PD pages. Additionally, created generic PLP, PDP, Header, and Footer components.
Handled the configuration of promotions and campaigns, providing assistance to the merchant during the setup process.
Successfully integrated Apple Pay and tailored the payment sheet to accommodate multi-shipment details.
Engaged in team collaboration to identify client requirements, review project progress, and strategize the implementation approach.
Proficient understanding of Shopify objects and Liquid templates.
Utilized the Shopify page builder to create both static and dynamic pages. Expertly managed various API requests, retrieving and manipulating data as needed.
Developed meta-fields for products and collections to facilitate dynamic data manipulation and retrieval.
Executed functional implementations on the product, collection, cart, and checkout pages, while also overseeing UI-related tasks.
Built a Shopify store from the ground up, accessible at apparooz.com.
Developed PLP custom price range range slider which enables good customer UI experience.
Implemeted compare functionality on the PLP page to allow comparison between multiple products from various categories which helps customer to buy suitable product
Services for the address suggestions on the postal code which helps user to select sub-address efficienty.
Engaged in team collaboration to identify client requirements, review project progress, and strategize the implementation approach.

internship.workExperience: Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio used to create .srt subtitle generation & integration procedure for any video format. Developed website templates (HTML/CSS/PHP) uploaded via FileZilla. Enabled offline-to-online MySQL DB connectivity.

education.university: Maharashtra state board of technical education
